mapper.select: SELECT a.`year_month` yearMonth, (SELECT COUNT(b.id) FROM crm_customer b WHERE date_format(b.create_time, '%Y-%m') = a.`year_month`) insertCustomerNum, (SELECT COUNT(c.id) FROM crm_customer_contacts c WHERE date_format(c.create_time, '%Y-%m') = a.`year_month`) insertContactsNum FROM (SELECT CONCAT(#{year}, '-01') AS `year_month` UNION SELECT CONCAT(#{year}, '-02') AS `year_month` UNION SELECT CONCAT(#{year}, '-03') AS `year_month` UNION SELECT CONCAT(#{year}, '-04') AS `year_month` UNION SELECT CONCAT(#{year}, '-05') AS `year_month` UNION SELECT CONCAT(#{year}, '-06') AS `year_month` UNION SELECT CONCAT(#{year}, '-07') AS `year_month` UNION SELECT CONCAT(#{year}, '-08') AS `year_month` UNION SELECT CONCAT(#{year}, '-09') AS `year_month` UNION SELECT CONCAT(#{year}, '-10') AS `year_month` UNION SELECT CONCAT(#{year}, '-11') AS `year_month` UNION SELECT CONCAT(#{year}, '-12') AS `year_month` ) a GROUP BY a.`year_month`
SELECT COUNT(a.id) number, b.`name` typeName FROM crm_customer a LEFT JOIN crm_customer_type b ON a.type_id = b.id GROUP BY a.type_id
SELECT COUNT(a.id) number, b.`name` fromName FROM crm_customer a LEFT JOIN crm_customer_from b ON a.from_id = b.id GROUP BY a.from_id
SELECT COUNT(a.id) number, b.`name` industryName FROM crm_customer a LEFT JOIN crm_customer_industry b ON a.industry_id = b.id GROUP BY a.industry_id
SELECT COUNT(a.id) number, b.group_name groupName FROM crm_customer a LEFT JOIN crm_customer_group b ON a.group_id = b.id GROUP BY a.group_id
SELECT COUNT(d.id) number, c.`name` typeName FROM crm_documentary_type c LEFT JOIN crm_documentary d ON d.type_id = c.id AND YEAR(d.create_time) = #{year} WHERE c.state = '2' GROUP BY c.id
